title: It’s 100% Fun!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>You were really great at your live the other day, Ruby-san! I’m glad I could tell you in person today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeeh!? Thank you, but compared to you, Setsuna-san, Ruby is still nothing.... Ruby somehow managed to do it only because Ruby did it together with everyone...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Hmm.... It didn’t seem like that to me, but if that’s what you say, Ruby-san, then maybe you’re right....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby doesn’t think it was good enough.... Eh, aaah, even though you’re complimenting me, sorry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You don’t have to apologize! I know how it feels to not be able to compromise on the things you love!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby is happy for your compliments, Setsuna-san. Ruby will work harder to be more confident!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You’re welcome! Umm, I probably shouldn’t say this after you said you weren’t satisfied with your own performance, but during the live, your face says that you were really enjoying it and 100% satisfied with it. When I see that, I gradually had more fun too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>....Ah, that’s true! You’re right! Ruby definitely enjoyed it 100%! Things can be frustrating at times, but lives are always so much fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’m glad! I was able to take in that feeling properly, huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby wonders if everyone else who watched it also had fun? Ruby wants to ask them right now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
